verses.verse: וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> now these שְׁמוֹת֙ <WH8034> Now these [are] the names בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> which came מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt אֵ֣ת <WH854> with יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> with Jacob אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man וּבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> and his household בָּֽאוּ׃ <WH935> came
רְאוּבֵ֣ן <WH7205> Reuben שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> Simeon לֵוִ֖י <WH3878> Levi וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> and Judah
יִשָּׂשכָ֥ר <WH3485> Issachar זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> Zebulun וּבְנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> and Benjamin
דָּ֥ן <WH1835> Dan וְנַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> and Naphtali גָּ֥ד <WH1410> Gad וְאָשֵֽׁר׃ <WH836> and Asher

וַֽיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> All נֶ֛פֶשׁ <WH5315> And all the souls יֹצְאֵ֥י <WH3318> that came out יֶֽרֶךְ־ <WH3409> of the loins יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> of Jacob שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> were seventy נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> souls וְיוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> for Joseph הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> was in בְמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> was in Egypt
וַיָּ֤מָת <WH4191> died יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> and all his brethren וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all הַדּ֥וֹר <WH1755> and all that generation הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel פָּר֧וּ <WH6509> were fruitful וַֽיִּשְׁרְצ֛וּ <WH8317> and increased abundantly וַיִּרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> and multiplied וַיַּֽעַצְמ֖וּ <WH6105> mighty בִּמְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> exceedingly מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> exceedingly וַתִּמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> was filled הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the land אֹתָֽם׃ <WH854> for פ

וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> Now there arose up מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king חָדָ֖שׁ <WH2319> a new עַל־ <WH5921> over מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> over Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not יָדַ֖ע <WH3045> which knew אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> not Joseph

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to his עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> unto his people הִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> Behold עַ֚ם <WH5971> Behold the people בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel רַ֥ב <WH7227> [are] more וְעָצ֖וּם <WH6099> and mightier מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> than

הָ֥בָה <WH3051> Come on נִֽתְחַכְּמָ֖ה <WH2449> let us deal wisely ל֑וֹ פֶּן־ <WH6435> or יִרְבֶּ֗ה <WH7235> with them lest they multiply וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תִקְרֶ֤אנָה <WH7122> and it come to pass that when there falleth out מִלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> any war וְנוֹסַ֤ף <WH3254> join גַּם־ <WH1571> will also הוּא֙ <WH1931> they עַל־ <WH5921> and שֹׂ֣נְאֵ֔ינוּ <WH8130> also unto our enemies וְנִלְחַם־ <WH3898> and fight בָּ֖נוּ וְעָלָ֥ה <WH5927> against us and [so] get them up מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> out of the land

וַיָּשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> Therefore they did set עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> over שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> captain מִסִּ֔ים <WH4522> discomfited לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because of עַנֹּת֖וֹ <WH6031> to afflict בְּסִבְלֹתָ֑ם <WH5450> them with their burdens וַיִּ֜בֶן <WH1129> And they built עָרֵ֤י <WH5892> cities מִסְכְּנוֹת֙ <WH4543> treasure לְפַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> for Pharaoh אֶת־ <WH853> פִּתֹ֖ם <WH6619> Pithom וְאֶת־ <WH853> רַעַמְסֵֽס׃ <WH7486> and Raamses

וְכַאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> they יְעַנּ֣וּ <WH6031> But the more they afflicted אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> them the more יִרְבֶּ֖ה <WH7235> they multiplied וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> and the more יִפְרֹ֑ץ <WH6555> and grew וַיָּקֻ֕צוּ <WH6973> And they were grieved מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> because בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
וַיַּעֲבִ֧דוּ <WH5647> to serve מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4713> Egyptian אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּפָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH6531> with rigour

וַיְמָרְר֨וּ <WH4843> bitter אֶת־ <WH853> חַיֵּיהֶ֜ם <WH2416> their lives בַּעֲבֹדָ֣ה <WH5656> bondage קָשָׁ֗ה <WH7186> with hard בְּחֹ֙מֶר֙ <WH2563> in morter וּבִלְבֵנִ֔ים <WH3843> and in brick וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> and in all manner of service בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> in the field אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲבֹ֣דָתָ֔ם <WH5656> all their service אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָבְד֥וּ <WH5647> wherein they made them serve בָהֶ֖ם בְּפָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH6531> [was] with rigour

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> spake מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֖ת <WH3205> midwives הָֽעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <WH5680> to the Hebrew אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> of whom שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> of which the name הָֽאַחַת֙ <WH259> of the one שִׁפְרָ֔ה <WH8236> [was] Shiphrah וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> of the other פּוּעָֽה׃ <WH6326> Puah

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said בְּיַלֶּדְכֶן֙ <WH3205> When ye do the office of a midwife אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעִבְרִיּ֔וֹת <WH5680> to the Hebrew women וּרְאִיתֶ֖ן <WH7200> and see עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָבְנָ֑יִם <WH70> [them] upon the stools אִם־ <WH518> if בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> if it [be] a son הוּא֙ <WH1931> you וַהֲמִתֶּ֣ן <WH4191> then ye shall kill אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וְאִם־ <WH518> if בַּ֥ת <WH1323> him but if it [be] a daughter הִ֖יא <WH1931> she וָחָֽיָה׃ <WH2425> then she shall live

וַתִּירֶ֤אןָ <WH3372> feared הַֽמְיַלְּדֹת֙ <WH3205> But the midwives אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and did not עָשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> and did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> commanded אֲלֵיהֶ֖ן <WH413> as מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> not as the king מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַתְּחַיֶּ֖יןָ <WH2421> alive אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְלָדִֽים׃ <WH3206> the men children

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> called מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֔ת <WH3205> for the midwives וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said לָהֶ֔ן מַדּ֥וּעַ <WH4069> unto them Why עֲשִׂיתֶ֖ן <WH6213> have ye done הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַתְּחַיֶּ֖יןָ <WH2421> alive אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְלָדִֽים׃ <WH3206> the men children

וַתֹּאמַ֤רְןָ <WH559> said הַֽמְיַלְּדֹת֙ <WH3205> And the midwives אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because לֹ֧א <WH3808> not כַנָּשִׁ֛ים <WH802> women הַמִּצְרִיֹּ֖ת <WH4713> [are] not as the Egyptian women הָֽעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <WH5680> Because the Hebrew כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because חָי֣וֹת <WH2422> for they [are] lively הֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> in בְּטֶ֨רֶם <WH2962> ere תָּב֧וֹא <WH935> come in אֲלֵהֶ֛ן <WH413> and הַמְיַלֶּ֖דֶת <WH3205> and are delivered וְיָלָֽדוּ׃ <WH3205> the midwives

וַיֵּ֥יטֶב <WH3190> dealt well אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> Therefore God לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֑ת <WH3205> with the midwives וַיִּ֧רֶב <WH7235> multiplied הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> and the people וַיַּֽעַצְמ֖וּ <WH6105> mighty מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> and waxed very

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because יָֽרְא֥וּ <WH3372> feared הַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֖ת <WH3205> And it came to pass because the midwives אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> that he made לָהֶ֖ם בָּתִּֽים׃ <WH1004> them houses

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> charged פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh לְכָל־ <WH3605> all עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> all his people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כָּל־ <WH3605> Every הַבֵּ֣ן <WH1121> Every son הַיִּלּ֗וֹד <WH3209> that is born הַיְאֹ֙רָה֙ <WH2975> into the river תַּשְׁלִיכֻ֔הוּ <WH7993> ye shall cast וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every הַבַּ֖ת <WH1323> and every daughter תְּחַיּֽוּן׃ <WH2421> ye shall save alive ס
